vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A woman of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.26.33;
daughter of: Zelophehad (H6765);
sister of: Noah (H5270), Hoglah (H2295), Milcah (H4435H) and Tirzah (H8656)
§ Mahlah = "disease"
1) the eldest of 5 daughters of Zelophehad the grandson of Manasseh
2) a Gileadite
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hija de Selofhad; tribu de Manasés; (b)   hijo de Hamoléquet; tribu de Manasés
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪拉 这个陰性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "疾病"
1) 西羅非哈五個女兒中的長女 , 瑪拿西的孫子
2) 基列人
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
玛拉 这个阴性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "疾病"
1) 西罗非哈五个女儿中的长女 , 玛拿西的孙子
2) 基列人

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A woman of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.18; her mother was Hammolecheth (H4447);
sister of: Ishhod (H0379) and Abiezer (H0044H)
§ Mahlah = "disease"
1) the eldest of 5 daughters of Zelophehad the grandson of Manasseh
2) a Gileadite
